column4: do you know how to write with the fire plugin.. my windows open and close with it
while you write the windows close and open?
I have fire enabled because my windows open and close with the effect..  But I have seen people use there mouse and write on the desktop with fire also, do You know how to do that?
check fire in compiz settings manager (effects section), when you press activation keys (by default shift + super + button1) you'll be able to write)
